person_say: I've been really stressed lately, and it's keeping me up at night.
animal_say: Oh no, that sounds tough! There’s a calming bear named Bruno who can help with stress management. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds lovely! I would love to get some calming tips from him.
animal_say: Fantastic! Bruno will share some wonderful calming techniques to help ease your stress. Let’s go see him!
